data.name: Shards of Chaos
data.detailed_description:
Shards.


“They call me Rain without knowing my real name. Rainstorm is my only salvation.
In this shattered world, where I have no friends or enemies... All I have to do is complete my contract and return to find someone who is waiting for me.”

You must voluntarily fall into the trap in order to find and protect “Lellia” — at the behest of a contract given by an ancient creature. The difficulties that Rain will meet along the way will make the girl doubt: is her ruthless path to achieve her goal right?

In these tests of fate, you will need to figure out the traitor among the extraordinary inhabitants of the mansion, protect Lellia, find the strength to survive, and unravel the mystery of the magical catastrophe.

The World Abandoned by the Gods.


The action takes place in the abandoned estate of the former Order called “Black Rose”. One day this estate was swallowed up by the magical catastrophe which spread death to all nearby lands, turning people into “Shadows”. You will have to plunge into this cursed place, where a mad & legendary adventurer, and a girl from the “Hel” clan are hiding in the darkness.

The dramatic story will unfold piece by piece, adding up to the overall picture of the dark mansion, reacting to your actions. Secrets, betrayals, a railway beyond space and time...
You'll go all this way with Rain, and it depends only on you — whether you can solve all the mysteries in time, whether you can forgo spilling blood... Or whether, on the contrary, you'll follow the scarlet path.

The Path.


  • A non-linear plot that can change depending on your choices.
Build logic chains, decide whether it's worth the risk, and what approach to choose for a particular character...

  • A dramatic story, not a dating sim.
“What are you fighting for? You... Lied to me?”. Feelings, logic and characters will be matter in this story.

  • The world will not wait while you contemplate your actions.
A comprehensive system that includes “TDA” moments, time-limited choices, and free-exploration moments will allow you to experience the world of the visual novel as alive, not just as the pages of a book.

data.short_description: “Raising the blade over my dear friend, I could only curse this broken world with all my soul. Nothing to worry about... If my blade turns out to be the slower.” Shards of fate, heart and soul.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8.1, 10 (x32/x64)
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU with SSE2 instruction
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard or Onboard Chipset
  • Additional Notes: Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (highly recommended); 16:10, 5:4, 4:3 (smaller FOV)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64), 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 or better (with SSE2 instruction)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard or Onboard Chipset
  • Additional Notes: Aspect Ratio: 16:9

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04 (x64).
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU with SSE2 instruction.
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 1 GB VRAM.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any.
  • Additional Notes: Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (highly recommended), 16:10, 5:4, 4:3, 3:2.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04 (x64).
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 and better (with SSE2 instruction).
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any.
